metadata.title: CVE-2015-5732 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the form function in theWP_Nav_Menu_Widget class in wp-includes/default-widgets.php in WordPressbefore 4.2.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia a widget title.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
